an6.48:1.1: Atha kho annataro brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
an6.48:1.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
an6.48:1.3: “‘sanditthiko dhammo, sanditthiko dhammo’ti, bho gotama, vuccati.
an6.48:1.4: Kittavata nu kho, bho gotama, sanditthiko dhammo hoti akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi”ti?
an6.48:2.1: “Tena hi, brahmana, tannevettha patipucchissami. Yatha te khameyya tatha nam byakareyyasi.
an6.48:2.3: santam va ajjhattam ragam ‘atthi me ajjhattam rago’ti pajanasi, asantam va ajjhattam ragam ‘natthi me ajjhattam rago’ti pajanasi”ti?
an6.48:2.5: “Yam kho tvam, brahmana, santam va ajjhattam ragam ‘atthi me ajjhattam rago’ti pajanasi, asantam va ajjhattam ragam ‘natthi me ajjhattam rago’ti pajanasi—
an6.48:2.6: evampi kho, brahmana, sanditthiko dhammo hoti …pe….
an6.48:3.6: santam va ajjhattam manosandosam ‘atthi me ajjhattam manosandoso’ti pajanasi, asantam va ajjhattam manosandosam ‘natthi me ajjhattam manosandoso’ti pajanasi”ti?
an6.48:3.8: “Yam kho tvam, brahmana, santam va ajjhattam manosandosam ‘atthi me ajjhattam manosandoso’ti pajanasi, asantam va ajjhattam manosandosam ‘natthi me ajjhattam manosandoso’ti pajanasi—
an6.48:3.9: evam kho, brahmana, sanditthiko dhammo hoti akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhi”ti.
an6.48:4.2: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
